name: Hex-Type_
description:
Controls

Left Mouse Button/Enter/Space  - Interact

Escape (in game) - Exit

Themes: Z-Type but no-one will blame you for giving up

(created in one week for the Playmakers Geek Week Jam)

Hex-Type_ is a short 20min typing game inspired by Z-Type where players play as Nicholais Krogh, a stubborn cop hired by the mysterious Evol to rescue her friend trapped within the virtual server world of Hex-Type. Visual novel-esque cutscenes are also a feature of this game, allowing you insight into the short story.
